Text: Euro exchange rate (EUR/CHF): on January 15, 2015, at 9:30 a.m. GMT, the SNB abandoned its floor on the EUR/CHF exchange rate via a surprise press release. The announcement shocked the FX market - EUR/CHF dropped 12.3 percent over the next few hours.
Cause: Euro exchange rate (EUR/CHF): on January 15, 2015, at 9:30 a.m. GMT, the SNB abandoned its floor on the EUR/CHF exchange rate via a surprise press release.
Effect: The announcement shocked the FX market - EUR/CHF dropped 12.3 percent over the next few hours.
Sentence: <e1>Euro exchange rate (EUR/CHF): on January 15, 2015, at 9:30 a.m. GMT, the SNB abandoned its floor on the EUR/CHF exchange rate via a surprise press release.</e1> <e2>The announcement shocked the FX market - EUR/CHF dropped 12.3 percent over the next few hours.</e2>
